overview: Sarah is currently the co-founder and co-CEO of Dressipi, an innovative fashion discovery and online styling service helping customers to find clothes that match their “Fashion Fingerprint”™. Prior to founding Dressipi, Sarah was the co-founder and CEO of Texperts.com, the world’s first text message question answering service. The company won numerous awards for its concept and technology, and received over £2.5 million in angel funding over the course of five years. In 2008 the company was sold to KGB, owners of the 118118 directory enquiries service, in a multi-million pound deal. The Times recently called Sarah one of the UK’s “top rising female entrepreneurs”, and she was named by Management Today magazine as one of the top 35 female entrepreneurs under the age of 35.
